website_summaries.verdict: Enhance a modern or retro backyard design with 4 well-structured chairs.
pros: Scratch-resistant and won't mark up floors, these outdoor chairs function great for permanent use or an impromptu party
Just as comfortable as they are photogenic
Expected to arrive packaged with care
cons: While the feedback is high overall, some customers note the chair's back is a bit rigid and may cause discomfort

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy these chairs!!!
customer_reviews.text: I too was worried about ordering these chairs with such few reviews, but I took the chance based on price and I am so glad I did! They came carefully packaged so that no scratches or dings would occur in transit. I ordered two sets of four and both sets look so amazing in my home! We have 5 at our kitchen table and 3 at our dining room table. I am pleased with the height of the chairs and also the comfort. My husband and I both really like them! I highly recommend these chairs. You won't find a better price for a set of 4 like these.
customer_reviews.author: TheMrsStephens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. Used on a back porch with a barn type outdoor kitchen feel. Bought thinking I would paint, but the silver fits in with other galvanized touches well, so I will leave them as is for now! Shipped well, stacked and padded.
customer_reviews.author: ChilenotChili

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I ordered these chairs. I was unsure about how comfortable they would be and I was wasn't sure of the true finish. I was pleasantly surprised when I received them. They are comfortable and fit great with my table. They are a distressed smoky muted black with a hint of copper underneath. Perfect for my decor. I'm considering purchasing another set. Amazing product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisL

customer_reviews.title: I love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They look beautiful with my farmhouse table. They came assembled and packed nicely. Beautiful color. i love them.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Very good looking but scratches?
customer_reviews.text: What I like: - It looks exactly how it was described - perfect size for adults - light Dislike: - When I got it, the products looks bended weird(picture #2) but when I put them together they came out fine, kinda scared me a little - I'm pretty sure I was very gentle while putting them together, but apparently it was really easy to created scratches on the chairs. like I stated above, that my parts were bended so I had to try to bend them all together into its spot. I really didn't like that.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshinester

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this order about an hour ago and am very satisfied with the purchase! I purchased a set of 4 in the Antique Black color and they look beautiful. Very glad I went with the Antique Black instead of the Bronze color. I love the rustic/weathered look. The chairs came stacked and very well packaged in a box. No dents/damages on any of the chairs.
customer_reviews.author: MYang

customer_reviews.title: Great, quality chairs for awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Great chairs, love the gunmetal. These are sturdy, though if you have a wider behind, it will hang off the chair. I mean, that's what my MIL tells me. My husband is 200 lbs and sits comfortably on them. They do get dirty easily and need cleaned frequently, but I expected that with 2 toddlers. They easily wipe down. They work great for my wood table and goal for rustic/farmhouse look. No shiplap ;) Also, the price was FABULOUS ($120 for 4 chairs), much better than other sites.
customer_reviews.author: Jujubea

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and style
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and style of the chair. They arrived well packaged and in perfect condition. The 4-Star rating is due to the pain they were to assemble on my own. You have to pry the side bars apart enough to screw them on the base of the chair, but they ended up scratching the sides of the chair because the metal is sharp. I had to tape socks on them to keep the from scuffing up the other chairs, while I worked on them. I have assembled IKEA furniture with less trouble. But I do get a lot of compliments on them. They are comfortable and definitely a statement piece.
customer_reviews.author: renaissance

customer_reviews.title: DENTS on the chairs, AFFORDABLE, STURDY
customer_reviews.text: I only put 4 stars because of the DENTS that the chairs have. But, for the price of the set, it outweighs the DENTS. I use these chairs for my outdoor living so I am not too concern with the dents that all the chairs have, but if you are going to use this as your everyday dining chairs you might want to consider that. I have these chairs for a little over a year and we always use it during weekend to eat outside and they are holding up really well. They are sturdy. The color is bronze side of the color which matches my dark walnut table.
customer_reviews.author: beyondloveandmotherhood

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!
customer_reviews.text: The paint finish is dull and faded in spots on two of the chairs. They also have very noticable rust spots. They were outdoors last summer for only a couple of months then stored in a dry garage. Highly disappointed. I repeat, do not buy these. Amazon no longer carries them and are available from other sources only. Smart move. Our bad luck wasted money as cannot return now.
customer_reviews.author: ---- Suzan Fant

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for price.  Came damaged.  Feet can mark.
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs, however they did come damaged. They ship them stacked in a set of four. The top chair was ok but the bottom three had dents on the seats from poor handling I assume. The seller did make it right and shipped me four more. These I used on my patio w my farm table and the black rubber feet stuck to my painted patio and removed the paint or left a black mark. I painted the feet bottoms w white paint and they don't stick now.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Not made for outdoor chairs
customer_reviews.text: While These chairs look nice, we put 2 outside on our patio and 2 at our inside dining table and they are perfectly fine inside but the 2 started to loose their finish very quickly and within 2 months outside are starting to rust. I’m really disappointed by that because we wanted to get more to put outside once we saw how they would don but now we’re not because they just don’t last outside. If you only want them inside then they’re good.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: To small of a seat area to be comfortable, and the back bar hits the persons upper ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent these back. The reviews on these were over-rated in my opinion. To small of a seat area to be comfortable, and the back bar hits the persons upper back uncomfortably. Quality of the product is OK at best. Some people might love these, but they were not good for us. Amazon and the manufacturing company were very good about taking them back and refunding the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for farmhouse kitchen
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful, durable and so affordable. They are the perfect compliment to our farm style table. We have an extention table and I like that the extra chairs are stackable and take up a small footprint in our closet when table isn't extended. Note, arm chairs in pic are a separate purchase
customer_reviews.author: graceTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Prone to scratching during assembly
customer_reviews.text: The chairs looked great out of the box and the packaging was appropriate to prevent shipping damage. The tops of the chairs did not all arrive at the same angle, so some had side braces that didn't extend to the outer edge of the seat once the back was attached. This made them more difficult to assemble than expected. As a result, 2 of my 4 chairs ended up with scratches from the side braces scraping the bottom piece in the assembly process. The scratches aren't very visible, however, and don't appear to cut through the paint to lead to a rust issue. They look great otherwise and seem sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyla

customer_reviews.title: I love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. Classic and practical for kids. After dinner they wipe down easily. These things also appear indestructible. I'm not worried about the kids hurting them or scratching them like I would be with wood chairs. You also can't beat the price. Other retailers sell literally the same chair for nearly 2x the cost. I would definitely recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerica Brodhead

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are fantastic for the price. They were packed safely and securely and arrived with no damage. They are a bit small but this does not bother me as I have them with my round kitchen table and they really open up my kitchen, They also match the four counter stools which I purchased several years ago and I still totally love this look. Casual with an interest!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia H.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy chairs but...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful chairs and came well packaged. Shipping was faster then I expected. They are very sturdy and good quality. I’m giving it 3 starts because I ordered antique white, the chairs are more bright white then antique white. A couple chairs had small dents and the chairs had a funky smell. The smell went away after I wiped them down.
customer_reviews.author: William Reber

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs!! The color is great and looks fantastic with our rustic farmhouse table. They were also really easy to put together. Going to order another set so we have 2 more chairs at our table and 2 extra chairs when we have a gathering.
customer_reviews.author: mardemou

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t assembled
customer_reviews.text: I love that the chairs are very sturdy. The main reason I purchased these was because the reviews said they came already assembled. That was not the case with mine. One chair back was bent and required some extra elbow grease. They did come quickly and the assembly wasn’t that bad but it would have been nice if they came preassembled.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate color description
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are excellent quality. However, "silver" is not the color we recieved. These chairs are painted Grey, not at all silver. Will probably return.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They are so cute and go along with the red theme in my kitchen. They are very durable. I have friends/family who are over 300 lbs and sit comfortably in them. They are regular table height chairs. They have a rubber bottom so that they do not scrape the floor. I have had them for about six months and I am very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R. Guajardo

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are exceptional! Especially for the price. ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are exceptional! Especially for the price. We actually bought these for a rental property near the beach. They have held up well all summer. You can't beat the price for such a high quality product. Unfortunately, we bought similar chairs from a high end furniture store for a different unit and ended up paying almost triple the price. I wish we found these before.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Zavitsanos

customer_reviews.title: looks great and well made.
customer_reviews.text: So far these are great. I am using them outside and under a cover to protect them a bit from the weather. What I love most (apart from the look which you can see from the pictures) is how they feel - well made and solid. The rubber soles protect your floor too. This is a quality item for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Trina English

customer_reviews.title: Bit small
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to have to go with 4 stars for these babies. They are nice. Comfy. Not for large butts. A little on the short side (reason for star deduction, though I didn't read the dimensions, thinking all chairs were standard) They look fab with our farm table and repurposed beam light. They don't *quite* measure up. Knowing what my people do to furniture, they will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: LMcD949

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: All 4 of the chairs we received were damaged. Also, the ad says there is no assembly required but there is! The backs of the chairs need to be attached to the seat and while attempting to do that, it was almost impossible to prevent scratching the chairs! Super disappointed and would not recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Link

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: I selected silver and they are actually gray. That is disappointing b/c gray is not the color I was going for but still love the chairs and if I could choose again, I'd choose the gunmetal color. I have a farmhouse theme and I do the tin and wood look. I thought silver would be closer to the tin look than gunmetal, but silver comes gray. I would have exchanged the chairs for gunmetal but I've already thrown out the box and assembled the chairs. I don't want any extra work. I do love the chairs though. They are really cute. They require some assembly but not too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper replacement model, different manufacturer?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these chairs 2 years ago and loved them. Solid, sturdy, heavy, welded. Reordered the same item from Amazon using our previous order and for the same price received much poorer quality chairs. Lighter, less sturdy, no longer welded so needing to assemble. They aren’t even the same shape so don’t look the same or stack well. Very disappointed. This company shouldn’t sell these as the same chair. Buyer beware. Previous reviews are misleading as any positive reviews are probably referring to the earlier version. Sad how people do this - cutting costs for an inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Everett

customer_reviews.title: I have a set thats Awesome, GOT ANOTHER and it was not good
customer_reviews.text: Have a set of gun metal and have been using them for six months. No issues and awesome stackable chairs. Wanted some new ones for my patio so I choose red. They do not come fully assembled like my previous order and the backs or the chairs were so bent that I could not assemble them and had to return the chairs. Beware that the quality of these chairs may be different than pictured. Note all the pictures show welded chairs without screws, therefore the red chairs I received were inaccurate (completely aside from the issues requiring me to return them)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Weber

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Item as described. Beautiful chairs. They look great with my antique wood dining table. At this price, I have no complaints. However, the distressed look is made by paint, so if you're looking for a higher end distressed look (this is somewhat of any oxymoron, but I guess design in this age is pretty much that), you may need to fork out some more money and go elsewhere. But in my opinion, these are a steal and totally worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: these chairs are great, they are smaller than my original
customer_reviews.text: these chairs are great, they are smaller than my original, so they took me a while to get used to them, but overall they are a great product. They do have a rubber black bottom on the legs, which has left marks and sticks to my concrete, I tried cleaning them, but I guess I just need to get the felt covers. Not a big deal, but just wanted people to be aware...probably not able to clean off of carpet very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Although the color did not look like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected, unfortunately we had to send them right back because I ordered the silver ones and these were not silver. They are more of a flat, muted gray. I was expecting a true, shiny silver. Although the color did not look like the picture, shipment was quick and the chairs appeared to be sturdy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They have an odd smell that has lingered for like 6 months now
customer_reviews.text: They have an odd smell that has lingered for like 6 months now. It's not too horrible but if I'm on the floor near them I can definitely smell the chairs. They look really cool tho and are an excellent price. I had family over for thanksgiving and they all held up great (some family members are bigger so it can be a concern). The chairs barely peak over my table but I like it that way.
customer_reviews.author: MalloRy

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED ❤
customer_reviews.text: These are BEAUTIFUL!!! There are some "flaws" but honestly it makes them look more authentic. You cannot beat this price either. The gunmetal finish goes perfectly with the style and colors of my house. I'm obsessed. And they're perfect size for a small dining area.
customer_reviews.author: missmojo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these chairs. The quality of the product is great for the price. They were very easy to assemble took about 3 minutes per chair; however, it is a two person job. One of us held and aligned the back while the other screwed in the pieces. The one comment i do have is the chairs are a lot less gold then they show online. They are definitely less gold and more black so don't let the gold turn you away from getting them it is a nice accent.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Kaplan

customer_reviews.title: Very cool chairs
customer_reviews.text: These go perfectly with my industrial farmhouse style table that I refinished. I did choose to get some seat cushions to put on them though because people in my house have bony bottoms.
customer_reviews.author: Danine Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my kitchen! If you are used to a wider seat, this is not the chair for you. It took some time for my Husband who is 6'3 to get used to sitting in them as we had larger chairs before I purchased these. Super easy to clean with 3 young children and slide easily on my hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Creelman

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not as sturdy as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of these chairs but unfortunately they aren’t as sturdy as I had hoped. The back part bends after time and the bolts come loose. So sad because we love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn N

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I purchasers these chairs for my large rustic table I built, and fully expected to have to assemble them. So when they came already assembled I was extremely pleased. I love the color and you can NOT beat the price, trust me I checked. Especially for such quality, I really scored with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Oredeen

customer_reviews.title: Contemporary Twist
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with the contemporary and sturdiness of the chairs. I only needed 6 but ended up getting 2 sets of four. Because they're small in width, I ended up using 4 on each side of my table. I liked how they looked without the area rug too. I'll check out both ways (with and without area rug). Comfort is okay, but perhaps long periods sitting may be a little uncomfortable. Shirley SoCal
customer_reviews.author: Shirley K.

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are exactly what I was looking for, style and size. They go perfect with my farmhouse decorated home. I purchased the antique black. They came securely packaged and already put together! No work other then taking them out of a box. I plan on ordering 2 more!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia C.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. I LOVE these chairs!!! They are so cute, a very modern rustic farmstyle!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend buying these chairs
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I received 4 chairs for this low of a price. It completes the farmhouse look I was going for in my dining. I would highly recommend buying these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Bad return policy
customer_reviews.text: The seats look nice but they feel flimsy and are too small to use at a dining table. The color is also more silver than other gunmetal chairs that I have seen. Do not buy these unless you are 100% sure that they will work for you. The seller refused to provide a prepaid return slip, so I had to ship them back myself at over $60 per box. Overall, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rusk

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT! Couldn't be happier...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are beautiful. They aren't bulky or super heavy which I like. I can't wait to get my table so I can have a full dining set. Arrived in only two days with free ground shipping. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Came a week early! Fully assembled and ready to go. Fit my grandmother's table perfectly and was exactly what I wanted for my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Emily J. Drake

customer_reviews.title: These chairs are great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. We have some stools from Pier One, these are every bit as good as those. Three of four chairs went together easily, the fourth took some muscle, but we eventually got it. They look great with our farmhouse table!
customer_reviews.author: poorgrammar

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!!😍
customer_reviews.text: The chairs arrived earlier than promised. They are exactly as advertised; sleek, very sturdy yet surprisingly comfortable chairs. I highly recommend and would definitely buy again if the need arose. If you're on the fence about buying, take the leap...you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Mule

customer_reviews.title: ... these chairs would be too small but they fit nicely with our round kitchen table
customer_reviews.text: We were worried these chairs would be too small but they fit nicely with our round kitchen table. It's been almost a year and they have held up through the children attacking them, food, being thrown around..etc.. Good Quality came put together. Easy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Britt9025kp

customer_reviews.title: They are a bit smaller than the chairs we see ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a bit smaller than the chairs we see on (for instance) Fixer Upper, but they were priced well and were the same size as every other dining chair for sale in this style.
customer_reviews.author: shazbot

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing chairs for the price. Look great and comfortable. Stackable and sturdy. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: The Price Family

customer_reviews.title: Check for bubbles in the paint.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets and love the chairs but we noticed a bubble on one chair when they arrived and since then after being used the paint is peeling off on that seat which is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Shokatma

customer_reviews.title: Came slightly damaged, but decent price
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I should have seen this coming given the other reviews. There is definitely a problem with their process when boxing these and/or shipping them. The top chair is fine, but the three stacked below it all had small dents and black marks on the same spots (see pictures) - where contact with the chair above it had occurred. The price is decent, so I think we'll keep them because it is the kind of chair my wife really wanted, but definitely disappointing. Wouldn't mind three "top" chairs being sent and I'll send the others back.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: Kid proof
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy metal chairs. Comfy considering there is no padding. Even my kids can’t break them
customer_reviews.author: Cannizzaro

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these chairs and they are very ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these chairs and they are very comfortable. They will match with most decor which is why we got them. The only downfall was that 2/4 came damaged, but the company replaced them right away.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Great price. They are exactly as pictured. Gunmetal color is dark grayish silver. Perfect for our (actual) farmhouse kitchen. No noticible defects as other have mentioned. Cam assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Kayli Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE them.
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. They are great quality and very sturdy. They are a little shorter which actually worked perfect for our breakfast room table. But they would be to short for our regular dining room table. We got the antique black and they are great. They are black with a subtle amount of antiqued detail. Just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: ... vintage industrial style coffee and flower shop- these were PERFECT! Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: I own a vintage industrial style coffee and flower shop- these were PERFECT! Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: I love these chairs. I gave 4 starts because of the chairs we couldnt get the screw into all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These chairs have been great! We've had them for a few months now
customer_reviews.text: These chairs have been great! We've had them for a few months now. When they arrived, they were already pre-assembled which was a shock to us since we did not upgrade to the "preassembled upon delivery" choice at checkout. They are much sturdier than we imagined they would be. They're also quite comfortable for being metal chairs without cushions. We had planned to buy cushions for them but have decided not to since they've arrived. Overall I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Hope Norris

customer_reviews.title: Handy stackable black chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Had a miss mash of extra chairs for my dinning room table and found these at Amazon. They are great! Stack easily in my closet and just pull them out when I need extra seating. Color of black goes with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Williams1

customer_reviews.title: Great chair! Tacky finish.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy ,comfortable chair. However, the antique finish was very unappealing. It was clearly painted on liberally with a brush and the color was a yellow gold. They were returned due to the unprofessional finish. The company was very professional with handling the return. I would shop their products based on their service alone.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These look exactly as the pictures show. It was a breeze putting them together. I can’t wait to see what they look like against my new table.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really like these chairs. Four stars only because they were more shiny than I was hoping and I would recommend two people putting the chairs together.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeyt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. We saw similar chairs in a restaurant and went looking fot them for our porch. Found them for a good price on Amazon. Two bases had dents when we went to assemble them. We contacted the seller who was very helpful in rectifying the issue. We are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: ALFbrewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chairs, I’m sure you have satin these before ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome chairs, I’m sure you have satin these before at some kind a café or ice cream shop. These are very good quality and totally worth the money we spent – no hesitations, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Nashville

customer_reviews.title: much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: much better than I expected, already assembled and arrived several days sooner than projected. sturdy. would have liked them to be a little bit taller, but still happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. Easy to assemble and the packaging was extensive as to avoid dents and scratches. They are super shiny and perfect for what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Davis

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome (including the price
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome (including the price!). I was looking for some inexpensive chairs when I first bought my house and these looked perfect. Really happy with them- I will not be replacing them for something fancier!
customer_reviews.author: E. Winchell

customer_reviews.title: Good find!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with my purchase. Light weight, comfortable, appear rustic- easy to install— sorta, had to have a little assistance! They are as I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Seriously these Chairs are amazing. Had a problem with a defective one... contacted One Big Outlet seller and they were sooo kind and quick to replace my damaged item. Love these chairs so much! Plan on buying four more.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Seriously scratched and warped.
customer_reviews.text: Love the chairs but they showed up heavily scratched with the paint completely missing from being shipped while stacked with out enough packaging. Also one chair is warped and doesn't sit level on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Love these chairs. I was so nervous I was going to have to send them back but they are just like the picture and sturdy! And a plus was no putting them together. They came all nicely stacked and individually wrapped so no damage could occurred. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: great...little narrow
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars for style. I will say the butts are more narrow than I'd hoped for. If you have a "big" family or family member, steer their behinds away from this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy K

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking chairs.
customer_reviews.text: Chairs arrived promptly. The back of one of the chairs was bent. My husband straightened it out. A sturdier box would have helped. Other than that they look great and I love that they stack.
customer_reviews.author: Rubie

customer_reviews.title: Functional and fun
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition and will last forever with care. Very sturdy. Very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Matches with everything, good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these at Ikea and other places for twice the price. THey come fully assembled and look great in my living room. They are comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Goldsman

customer_reviews.title: these appear to be manufactured with a lot of quality ...
customer_reviews.text: these appear to be manufactured with a lot of quality but be away that these are a MATTE finish. we were expecting GLOSS and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect/ Sturdy/Good Price
customer_reviews.text: We purchases (8) chairs (2 sets of 4) and this is absolutely the best price I have seen. The chairs are plenty sturdy, arrived well packaged and did not require any assembly.(yea!) They look perfect with a shabby chic white farm table my husband built for our bed and breakfast. Will be under a covered outdoor area and it will be used. Our guests at Thanksgiving will be using it for a family dinner(perfect) Good quality and fast shipping. Great price
customer_reviews.author: connie stephens

customer_reviews.title: and Amazon for industrial-looking chairs like this to match our new wooden dining/bench set
customer_reviews.text: Looked at Walmart, Target, and Amazon for industrial-looking chairs like this to match our new wooden dining/bench set. These were the most affordable that received great reviews. Received them in 2 days with Amazon Prime and have no complaints! They arrived perfectly in tact, the "gunmetal" color was beautiful, and there was no need to assemble anything.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine90

customer_reviews.title: Assembly possibly required?
customer_reviews.text: I would have given these a 5, but I ordered two sets and one came assembled and the other did not. Which is frustrating, since I opened the box expecting them to be assembled like the other box. Other than that they look great with our table and seem to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Faulkes

customer_reviews.title: They’ve held up great so far
customer_reviews.text: We’ve gotten tons of compliments on these! Ordered 8 total to go with our new table custom built by my husband. They’ve held up great so far!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chairs came in time, the bad thing about them, the back was bending in all of the chairs also we choose the bronze color and it looks like dark green. They are ok for what we want them for
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Conwell

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this purchase as chairs seem sturdily made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to use with antique oak table at family lake cottage. Very pleased with this purchase as chairs seem sturdily made, are very attractive and will hold up. I priced these type of chairs at numerous sites and feel theses were very good price. Received promptly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Edblom

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs, great company
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable, sturdy, and very modern. Fast shipping, fast delivery. Company went above and beyond to answer all questions. Would not hesitate to order again from this company. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Schamy

customer_reviews.title: Great design and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Once we got these chairs I started seeing the style everywhere. Great chairs and you can't beat the value. They sit level and don't squeak or flex. They also stack nicely for storage, especially if you have a couple extra like me (I bought a second set).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these chairs. Minimal assembly and look great. Seem very sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had these chairs for a few years now & they’ve held up well. Couldn’t be happier! Easy to clean. Very sturdy. Love the general look.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Easy to put together. They are sturdy and look nice with my dining room table. There was a problem with one of the backs so I messaged the seller and they promptly sent a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Peeling
customer_reviews.text: Have only had these chairs for a month and they are already starting to peel. They do not get used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are more green
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion these are not blue, they are more green as can be seen in the picture; regardless they are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: These are a silver sparkle with a matte finish. I was expecting hammered metal and glossy. I returned them. Even though they were not the finish I wanted, and I returned them, they are nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Val T

customer_reviews.title: Light brown not bronze.
customer_reviews.text: Description for product on Amazon says that the color is bronze. Received order and the chairs are a light brown not bronze. The box on the outside said brown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They were perfect for my weathered gray farmhouse table
customer_reviews.text: They were perfect for my weathered gray farmhouse table. I have a lot of galvanized decor in my apartment so I was looking for chairs that would go well. I purchased 4 and plan to purchase 2 more formal chairs for the ends of the table. There was an off smell that lingered for a couple days, but not a big deal at all. I definitely recommend. Especially for the price and since they are outdoor chairs as well, if we no longer want them inside we can switch it up and move them outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: ... these as outdoor chairs and they have been working great!
customer_reviews.text: Using these as outdoor chairs and they have been working great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hoeft

customer_reviews.title: Great Chairs
customer_reviews.text: The chairs are beautiful, however I contacted the seller via email once they arrived regarding a few dents and some paint issues I found and the seller never responded. So although the chairs are sturdy and are just the look we had hoped for I am disappointed in the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: tiffmiller

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these chairs
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these chairs. I recently purchased a vintage black and white porcelain kitchen table and these chairs are perfect with it. You can’t beat the price for 4 kitchen chairs. Very sturdy I think they’re going to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Good price for quality chairs. The bronze on the black chairs is muted and not too bright, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, great product. FedEx misplaced my 1st order after being delayed by a snowstorm, but as always Amazon's awesome team replace the order with a new set and this one was delivered on time. I'm very happy with these chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These are too small for my dining table but I'm keeping them for extra chairs on my deck. They are heavy and sturdy. Comfortable too. They are made to last forever. So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Laversa Carlin

product_meta.title: BELLEZE Vintage Style Metal Dining Chairs - Antique Black (Set of 4) Stackable Backrest Chair for Kitchen & Office
product_meta.description:
Color:Antique BlackTired of buying a different set of chairs for every room in your house and in the end they break down one after another and don’t look the way you had imagined them in your beautiful home. 
Belleze’s metal dining chairs are made out of sturdy metal sheets that are powder-coated, making them scratch, soil, rust, and water resistant. Each chair is designed in a minimalistic vintage style which adds a splash of antiqueness to your rooms
A set of 4 stylish chairs that are sturdy, modern, and gives enough support for you to enjoy a stable family dinner
feature_bullets: STURDY QUALITY - Belleze dining chairs are made out of prime-quality metal sheets which makes them sturdy and the powder coating adds the vitality of being scratch, rust, and soil-resistant. These chairs will be serving youand your family for a very long time

STABLE DESIGN - While we can't say that your kids won't be spilling some food over the table, our chairs do avoid them from falling. Each of the chair's legs is reinforced with plastic cap and X-brass support is added under the seat for extra stability

LIGHTWEIGHT & STACKABLE - Our chairs are easy to carry due to each one of the sets of 4 being designed to be lightweight. Their compact size and the ability to be stacked into one also allows you to store them without worrying about space consumption

VERSATILE STYLE - Buying a pair of chairs for different settings can really be annoying and not to mention, it can shrink your wallet. These stylish vintage designed chairs were crafted keeping a variety of ambiances in mind like cafe, dining room, bedroom, lounge, hall, kitchen, and more

EASY TO ASSEMBLE - Unlike most antique-looking chairs, Belleze's vintage metal dining chairs can be assembled within a matter of minutes. Simply attach the backrest to the corresponding place of the seat and lock them with the provided screws

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars311 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
